scripts.dev:clean: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf .next && npm run dev
scripts.port:check: lsof -i :3000 && lsof -i :3001 && lsof -i :3002 || echo 'All ports are free'
scripts.port:kill: lsof -ti:3000,3001,3002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No processes to kill'
scripts.health:check: node -e "console.log('Node:', process.version); console.log('Memory:', Math.round(process.memoryUsage().heapUsed / 1024 / 1024) + 'MB'); console.log('Platform:', process.platform);"
